title: Did Stelers coach Mike Tomlin, Reap, Alejandro Villanueva, not protest during the national anthem?
subtitle: Some sites have made false allegations that the trainer criticized the veterans of the United States army for having stood up during the national anthem.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: :: Trainer Stillers in Pittsburgh Mike Tomlin, one of his players, Alejandro Villanueva, to stand him near the sidelines while playing the national anthem before the national football game.
